enhanced_by.reason: The getInstance method relies on the state of the TLD override arrays, which can be modified by the updateTLDOverride method.
Environment setup might be required before obtaining an instance of DomainValidator, especially if custom TLD overrides are needed.
Both getInstance and isValid methods are crucial for validating domain names and share similar functional goals.
Both methods validate domain names, with isValidDomainSyntax focusing on syntax and getInstance on obtaining a validator instance.
